description: System-wide Akka.Cluster metrics used for profiling Akka.NET performance

panels.description: Total number of active Akka.Cluster Members.

targets.query: SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'Up') AND time >= now() - 30s)
SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'WeaklyUp') AND time >= now() - 30s)
SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'Joining') AND time >= now() - 30s)
SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'Leaving') AND time >= now() - 30s)
SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'Exiting') AND time >= now() - 30s)
SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE ("status" = 'Down') AND time >= now() - 30s)

panels.title: Active Cluster Size

panels.description: All nodes in the cluster that are detected to be unreachable.

targets.query: SELECT CEIL(*) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.reachable" WHERE ("reachable" = 'false') AND time >= now() - 30s)

panels.title: Unreachable Nodes

alert.message: {{B}} nodes have been unreachable for at least 1 minute.
alert.name: Unreachable Akka.Cluster Nodes

panels.description: Tracks all nodes by their membership status and reachability.

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.cluster.members" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "status" fill(linear)

panels.title: Cluster Nodes by Status

panels.description: Total aggregate logging activity per-second for each node in an Akka.NET cluster.
panels.title: Cluster Logging Activity

panels.description: Groups all exceptions detected in Akka.NET logs by type.

targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.logs" WHERE ("cluster_role" =~ /^$role$/ AND "akka_address" =~ /^$address$/ AND "exceptiontype" =~/[.]/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "exceptiontype", "akka_address", "cluster_role"

panels.title: Exceptions by Type

panels.description: Total errors logged by Akka.NET over past 5 minutes, cumulative for all roles / cluster / exception types.
panels.title: Total Errors Logged

panels.description: The full set of Akka.NET actors running on all nodes for all roles in a cluster.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.actor.created" WHERE ("cluster_role" =~ /^$role$/ AND "akka_address" =~ /^$address$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "akka_address", "cluster_role" fill(linear)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "akka.net__akka.actor.stopped" WHERE ("cluster_role" =~ /^$role$/ AND "akka_address" =~ /^$address$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "akka_address", "cluster_role" fill(linear)

panels.title: Total Akka.NET Actors

panels.description: Cumulative Akka.NET messaging throughput across all selected nodes and roles.
panels.title: Total Actor Throughput (msg/s)

panels.description: Top 10 actor starts / stops by type.
panels.title: Live Actors by Type (Top 10)

panels.description: Top 10 actor type / exception type pairs, based on the number of crashes per second observed over a 30 minute timespan.
panels.title: Actor Crashes by Actor / Exception (Top 10)

panels.description: Akka.NET message throughput by message type.

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate.mean") FROM "akka.net__akka.messages.recv" WHERE ("akka_address" =~ /^$address$/ AND "cluster_role" =~ /^$role$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "messagetype" fill(null) LIMIT 10

panels.title: Akka.NET Message Throughput by Type  (Top 10)

panels.description: Akka.NET message throughput by message type.
panels.title: Akka.NET Message Totals by Type  (Top 10 over 5 minutes)

panels.description: Akka.NET message processing latencies by actor / message type. Values are in milliseconds.
panels.title: Message Processing Latencies by Type (Top 10)

title: Akka.NET Cluster + Phobos Metrics (Influx Data Source)
